path: ./Audit_Reports_2024/Verichains_Lab/Verichains Public Audit Report - Tioswap Smartcontracts - v1.1.pdf

findings.title: Timestamp Dependence
findings.description: The contract relies on timestamp-based logic, which can be manipulated by miners or other actors.

findings.title: Transaction-Ordering Dependence
findings.description: This vulnerability occurs when the outcome of a transaction depends on the order in which it is executed.

findings.title: DoS with (Unexpected) revert
findings.description: The function finalizeTrade may cause a Denial of Service (DoS) due to an unexpected revert when the payment transfer fails.

findings.title: DoS with Block Gas Limit
findings.description: The contract can be vulnerable to a denial-of-service (DoS) attack by exploiting the block gas limit.

findings.title: Gas Usage, Gas Limit and Loops
Explicit visibility of functions state variables (external, internal, private and public)
findings.description: Functions or state variables with explicit visibility can lead to unintended access and potential security risks.
